<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=508) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 173 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Animal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=311)

</column>

---

Your animal companion grows up, becoming a [mature animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=155) and gaining additional capabilities. If you have the [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10) action, your animal companion assaults the prey even without your orders. During an encounter, even if you don't use the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) action, your animal companion can still use 1 action that round on your turn to Stride toward or Strike your prey.

<title level="2">Mature Animal Companion (Ranger) leads to...</title>
[Incredible Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=520)
